name: DeadlyCamp
description:
Interpretation of classic party games Mafia and Werewolf. It is a game of murder, accusations, deceit and mob hysteria

How To Play

The game ranges from 6 to 10 players. These players are randomly divided into alignments - Survivors(Town), Imitators( Mafia), Killer(Neutral), Satanist(Neutral). As a Survivor you must track down the villains before they kill you. You don't know who is a Survivor and who is not.  Imitators know each other...

more info in our discord channel: https://discord.com/invite/gUwGe83
